documentation.text:
@title PBMTokenManager Interface. 
 @notice The PBMTokenManager is the stores details of the different data types.

@title PBMTokenManager Interface. 
 @notice The PBMTokenManager is the stores details of the different data types.

params.amount: The amount of tokens that were transferred
params.creator: The creator of the this PBM type
params.expiry: The time (in epoch) when the PBM type will expire
params.tokenId: The account from which the tokens were sent, i.e. the balance decreased
params.tokenName: The account to which the tokens were sent, i.e. the balance increased

params.tokenIds: The ids for the PBM in query

returns._0: Returns true if all the tokenId are valid else false

params.companyName: The name of the company/agency issuing this PBM type
params.contractExpiry: the expiry time (in epoch) for the overall PBM contract
params.creator: The address of the account that creates the PBM type
params.spotAmount: The number of ERC-20 tokens that is used as the underlying currency for PBM
params.tokenExpiry: The expiry date (in epoch) of th PBM type
params.tokenURI: the URI containting the metadata (opensea standard for ERC1155) for the  PBM type

params.amounts: The amounts by whch the supply counnt needs to be decreased
params.tokenIds: The ids for which the supply count needs to be decreased

params.tokenId: The id for the PBM in query
The id for the PBM in query

returns._0: Returns the count of the PBM

params.tokenId: The id for the PBM in query

returns._0: Returns the address of the creator

params.tokenId: The id for the PBM in query

returns.creator: Creator for the PBM type
returns.expiry: Expiry time (in epoch) for the PBM type
returns.name: The name of the PBM type
returns.spotAmount: Amount of underlying ERC20 held by the each of the PBM token

params.tokenId: The id for the PBM in query

params.amounts: The amounts by whch the supply counnt needs to be increased
params.tokenIds: The ids for which the supply count needs to be increased

params.sender: updated token URI to convey revoking, if part of design
params.tokenId: The PBM tokenId which has been revoked
The id for the PBM in query

returns._0: Returns the metadata URI for the PBM

NewPBMTypeCreated(uint256,string,uint256.notice: Event emitted when a new PBM token type is created

areTokensValid(uint256[]).notice: Checks if tokens Ids have been created and are not expired

createTokenType(string,uint256,uint256,a.notice: Creates a PBM token type, with all its necessary details

decreaseBalanceSupply(uint256[],uint256[.notice: decreases the supply count for the PBM

getPBMRevokeValue(uint256).notice: gets the total value of underlying ERC20 tokens the PBM type holds

getTokenCount(uint256).notice: gets the count of the PBM type in supply

getTokenCreator(uint256).notice: gets the address of the creator of the PBM type

getTokenDetails(uint256).notice: Retreive the details for a PBM

getTokenValue(uint256).notice: gets the amount of underlying ERC20 tokens each of the the PBM type holds

increaseBalanceSupply(uint256[],uint256[.notice: increases the supply count for the PBM

revokePBM(uint256,address).notice: performs all the necessary actions required after the revoking of a PBM type

uri(uint256).notice: Returns the URI (metadata) for the PBM with the corresponding tokenId

userdoc.notice: The PBMTokenManager is the stores details of the different data types.
